nn.core

Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • nn.core.NeuralNetwork
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeedForwardNeuralNetwork

    public abstract class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for NeuralNetworks made up of Units.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  NeuralNetwork.Tester
      Interface implemented by objects that can test a NeuralNetwork.
      static interface  NeuralNetwork.Trainer
      Interface implemented by objects that can train a NeuralNetwork.

      Run a k-fold cross-validation experiment on this NeuralNetwork using the given Examples and return the average accuracy over the k trials.

      • test

        public abstract boolean test(Example example)
        Return true if this NeuralNetwork gets the right answer on the given Example. ``Getting the right answer'' depends on how the problem is represented in the network, so this method must be implemented by subclasses.

      • test

        public double test(java.util.List<Example> examples)
        Return the accuracy (proportion correct) for this NeuralNetwork on the given list of Examples.

      • kFoldCrossValidate

        public double kFoldCrossValidate(java.util.List<Example> examples,
                                 int k,
                                 NeuralNetwork.Trainer trainer,
                                 NeuralNetwork.Tester tester)
        Run a k-fold cross-validation experiment on this NeuralNetwork using the given Examples and return the average accuracy over the k trials.
